data.actual_result: They freak out and question themselves - then realize that it's an invalid link since you're at max servers
data.short_description: "INVITE TO SERVER" embed glitches when you enter an invalid code OR when trying to join a server when you have 100 servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure you're in 100 servers - Have a friend or an alt spam a bunch of the same invite link in your DMs - stay on that dm channel, press the little plus at the bottom of your list, join server, enter the code and observe the embeds in the back
